value:
Climate change is real, and evidence is all around you.
Prove it with Green Memes!
Pick 1 factual text statement on climate change that you think best relates with the image
Pick 1 factual image on climate change issues
Pick an emoji reflecting your feelings about this piece of fact. This completes the green meme! (Having doubts about the image/text? let us know!)
You can now share this Green Meme on explanatory Facebook/Instagram, and it links to a explanatory news product based on the text statement.
